name: Sub Buddy
description:
Hello (: Thank you for giving Sub Buddy a chance.

Controls:

Sub Buddy fires automatically.

NumKeys 8, 5, and 0:  Move up, move down, and restart.

Movement keys can be held down for continuous movement.

The collision area is Sub Buddy's face, rather than his submarine.

Content:

Help Sub Buddy defeat three sea creatures in random order, then defeat the boss in a typhoon. Rinse and repeat in this highscore game until poor Sub Buddy kerplunks.

This game was created for Nokia3310 Jam.

The only sound effects in the game occur when you begin the game, lose, or defeat an enemy. There is background music during the boss battle.

The game window can be resized.
